stimulusHtml: A particle moves along the y-axis. The graph of the particle’s position y(t) at time t is shown above for 0 ≤ t ≤ 5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EF7@ . For what values of t is the velocity of the particle negative and the acceleration positive?
